price: 85. De Dag waarop Wij de godvrezenden tot de meest barmhartige zullen verzamelen.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
